template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the {industry} space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the fintech space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Research and create a multi-format content campaign on a fintech topic, ensuring brand consistency across all channels and defining clear metrics to measure its performance.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a single-sentence prompt for a fintech content campaign that covers research, multi-format creation, cross-channel consistency, and measurable goals, all under 45 words. 

The key elements to include are the fintech domain, research phase, varied content formats, channel alignment, and defined outcomes. Need to keep it concise but comprehensive. 

Maybe structure it as a clear instruction starting with the action, specifying the components, and ending with the goal. Let me count the words to stay within the limit.
